# File lib/innate/options/dsl.rb, line 102
    def get(key, *keys)
      if keys.empty?
        if value = @hash[key.to_sym]
          value
        elsif @parent != self
          @parent.get(key)
        else
          nil
        end
      elsif sub_options = get(key)
        sub_options.get(*keys)
      end
    end
